channel.title: shows on sba
channel.description: Recent content in shows on sba

item.title: Call out for Art: Punk Jazz
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Call out for Art/Artists/Performers! üß∑ Punk/Jazz üé∑ Can you do an art? Would you like to do an art for us? Do you perform? Navigators Art are looking for submissions for a visual art show with a supporting live musical performance night. See @navigatorsart üëà over there or message for more details.. üö® Submission deadline 17th July

item.title: Living Treasures Live Performance @ The Basement, City Screen York
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: üö® This weekend! We’ve still got some tickets left for the Live performance night (Sat) and Film (Sun). Get on it pretty quick sharp and let the good peoples know about it as the live show at City Screen Picturehouse is going to be something a little bit special.. Check @navigatorsart for more info flow. Accompanying art is on show at York Explore See you down there ‚úåÔ∏è

item.title: Hidden/Living Treasures @ York Explore & City Screen
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: We are live! New HIDDEN TREASURES exhibition at York Explore Library as a part of the York Festival of Ideas Inspired by local streets and sights (though not the obvious ones!) as well as by works in York Art Gallery and elsewhere. Open daily during library hours and free - but make sure you book for our other very special Festival events soon! üëç At City Screen Picturehouse York: LIVING TREASURES - live performance 10 June

item.title: Dreamtime Now Showing @ City Screen York
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: I’ll be showing some work soon at City Screen Picturehouse,York alongside fellow Navigators from 12th March until 21st April Preview night will be in the upstairs gallery (from March 12) Full show in gallery and bar (from March 19) Launch night!! drinks and chat (Sunday 19th March 1930 until 2100) Come along and see you there!

item.title: Coney St Jam Ending Soon
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: It’s been a good ol' run down at Coney St. but all things must come to an end. If you’ve not caught the show yet this is the final weekend coming up. This Saturday 14th from 10-5pm grab yourself a unique piece of original art, postcard, print or zine at a kind of impromptu Art Market in the space. Thanks a ton to StreetLife York for having us and check out this piece on @charleshutchpress (link below) to find out what Navigators Art are up to next.

item.title: Now Showing @ Helmsley Arts Centre
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Pleased to be showing some of my works alongside fellow Navigators | @navigatorsart at the Helmsley Arts Centre Moving Pictures II runs until the 3rd March 2023.

item.title: Setting up Moving Pictures II @ Helmsley Arts Centre
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Getting the year started with a lil show alongside fellow Navigators | @navigatorsart at Helmsley Arts Centre. Huge thanks to the volunteers there who got the whole thing up and looking great with amazing speed and efficiency. Moving Pictures II is open until 3rd March

item.title: Now Showing @ StreetLife, Coney St, York
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: “We are very excited to invite you down to Coney Street to see what we’ve been working on: StreetLife presents CONEY ST JAM: an art intervention by Navigators Art OPENING on Mon, 17 OCT 2022 ENDING Sat, 19 NOV 2022 (10am ‚Äì 5pm Mon-Sat except Weds, & Sun 11-4pm) 29-31 Coney Street, York ‘Inspired by StreetLife‚Äôs research and findings, this collective of 12 local artists are mounting a celebratory closing exhibition for the Project.

item.title: Moving Pictures @ City Screen, York
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Pleased to announce that I will have some art work up in this group show, do come along! MOVING PICTURES at City Screen York 13th March - 15th April 2022 The first week from 13th March is a preview in the cafe with a selection of works LAUNCH NIGHT for the extended show is on Sunday 20th March 19:30 - 21:00 with wine, snacks and chat. City Screen Picturehouse, York

item.title: Now Showing @ Piccadilly Pop Up, York
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: PICCADILLY POP UP “Art - at - tax” creative gallery & artists' studios Every Saturday 12-6pm FREE ENTRY Open studios, local artists exhibiting and selling work. Originals - Prints - Postcards - Photography - Books - Poetry - plus artefacts rare and strange ‚Ä¶ Come along this SATURDAY AND EVERY SATURDAY! @23 Piccadilly, York, YO1 9PG Swinson House (the old tax office just past SPARK) Facebook Event

item.title: Navigators Close to the Edge, MA Fine Art Final Show
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Pleased to announce I will be showing some mixed media paintings and sculpture in this show in York with fellow MA Fine Art students from York St John University Opening tonight! 17th September @5pm. The show runs until Friday 20th September 2019 and we will be moving on to take part with the Global Strike. We have a schedule of spoken word poetry performances and musical contribution on the opening night, with free wine and all that good stuff.

item.title: Navigators Crossing the Line @ Spark, York
item.author: info@stevebeadleart.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Pleased to announce I will be showing some recent paintings in this art show at SPARK* in York with fellow MA Fine Art students from York St John University Opening night is 5th June @7pm with free wine and snacks for our first arrivals. The show runs until 11th June (10am>10pm). We have performances and contributions on Wednesday and Friday evening. Will be great to see you there! ‚úåÔ∏è
